alert.note: Alert for Talbot; Taylor; Upson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 2:19PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Upson, Talbot and northwestern Taylor Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 219 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Pleasant Hill, or 8 miles north of Talbotton, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thomaston, Talbotton, Manchester, Woodland, Junction City, Lincoln Park, Sunset Village, Baldwinville, Po Biddy Crossroads, Sprewell Bluff State Park, Pleasant Hill, Howard, Salem, Prattsburg, Big Lazer Creek Wma, Carsonville, and Wesley Church. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
